name: Pedestrians
text: "Woah!?" "What's with you!?" "Don't run through here!!"

name: Me
text: Sorry, we're in a hurry!!
We ran, pushing our way through the heinous-looking crowd of pedestrians.
However, the gap between us and the group of High Orcs ahead was not getting any smaller.
There were too many people around to run properly.

name: Me
text: Gah!! This isn't looking good...
From ahead of the crowd, we could hear Shikanosuke's plaintive cries of "Aieeee!"
Shikanosuke was already in a precarious situation in multiple ways.

name: Hebiko
text: What do we do Fuma-chan? Hebiko could jump over the people ahead of us with my Octopus Jump and...

name: Me
text: No... that wouldn't be good either.

name: Hebiko
text: Why not?
Running alongside me, Shizuru also nodded her head in agreement.

name: Shizuru
text: He's right. We'll stand out too much if we use our Taimanin Jutsu here.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, right. Heberybody's on an undercover mission after all.
In which case, all we could do was force our way through the crowd.
But would we be able to catch up to them like that...?
Hey now!! You lot's evildoings end here!!!

name: High Orc Chief
text: Ahn!? And who the hell are you!?

name: Me
text: Huh?
Just then, we could hear a commotion rise up from ahead of the crowd in front of us.
Somebody had blocked the way of the High Orc group that abducted Shikanosuke.
Kidnapping people, what a bunch of villains you are!! Come on, let go of that kid right now!
I will not tolerate any misdeeds or violence perpetrated against innocent citizens for as long as I live!!

name: High Orc
text: What'd you sayyyyy!!?

name: Pedestrians
text: (That's... the "Storm Knight!!") (It's a Nomad Devildom Knight...!!)

name: Me
text: A Devildom Knight...?
Thanks to the intruder's sudden arrival we had managed to catch up.
A crowd of people quickly surrounded the group of High Orcs, determined to get a good view...
...and having caught up with them, we were able to blend in and go unnoticed.

name: Shizuru
text: She's "Storm Knight" Lena. If I recall, she's a subordinate under the direct supervision of Devildom Knight Ingrid...
Shizuru whispered softly, standing next to me.

name: Me
text: !? Isn't Ingridー
I inadvertently shuddered.
Devildom Knight Ingrid was a senior executive of Nomad and a renowned swordswoman within the underground world.
But I found it hard to believe that such a cute-looking little girl could be the subordinate of such a big shotー

name: High Orc
text: Shut up you damn bitch!! Get in the way and I'll split you right down the middle!!
It seemed he might've had the same thought as I did.
Faces twisted violently the High Orc group all jumped her at once.

name: Hebiko
text: Waah!? She's a goner if we don't...

name: Shizuru
text: ...No, you don't need to worry about her Hebiko-chan.
Shizuru quietly held back Hebiko, who had reflexively tried to jump in.
And then, as we all watched on...

name: Lena
text: If you will not listen then I have no choice!! Behold, the Demon Sword: Sakura Blossom bestowed upon me by Lady Ingrid!!!

name: Lena
text: Bear witness to its power!! Haaaaaaa!!!
In one smooth continuous motion, the girl drew her blade and brought it down with a booming cry.
And then, enveloping the blade, a wind wreathed in magical power and a massive amount of flower petals danced into the air―

name: Lena
text: Special Attack!! Cherry Flurry!!
*Slashh!! Slash slash slashh―!!!*

name: HIgh Orc Chief
text: !!? Groaaargh!!!!

name: High Orcs
text: Ngh!!! Gyaaaaaaaa!!!

name: Me
text: Ohh...
It was just as Shizuru said.
Despite her adorable appearance, she had defeated all those brawny High Orcs in a single stroke.

name: Lena
text: ―I will spare your lives. Leave that kid and get out of here!!

name: High Orc Chief
text: D-Damn yoooou!! We'll remember this you damn whore!!
Apparently, she had enough leeway to hold back from killing them.
The High Orcs retreated, bemoaning their unsightly defeat.

name: Me
text: (Letting them get away so easily... Quite lenient, but I guess this is a Devildom Knight.)
The girl declared to the High Orcs that she "won't tolerate misdeeds."
It had been an unimaginably honorable statement for a resident of the underworld.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Haiee, that was terrifying...
Together with the released Shikanosuke, the Devildom Knight Lena came over to us.

name: Lena
text: Is this kid with you? Sorry about that, those guys were terrible.

name: Me
text: N-Not at all... In fact we should be the ones thanking you.

name: Lena
text: Don't worry about it!! This district is part of Nomad's territory. Naturally, it's the role of the Devildom Knights to maintain order here!!

name: Me
text: Y-, yeah...
She puffed out her chest proudly. She had so much strength and yet in contrast to that some of her mannerisms were so child-like.

name: Lena
text: Anyway, what are you guys doing here in Yomihara? You don't look like the scoundrels who typically have business in this city...

name: Me
text: Ah, about that...
She was staring at us with a very curious look on her face.
Of course, it wouldn't be good if anyone from Nomad found out we were Taimanin.
And just as I was thinking about how to maintain our cover...

name: Shizuru
text: Thank you, Ms. Devildom Knight. We've... come here to search for a friend who's gone missing.

name: Me
text: (Oh! Nice one, Shizuru!!!)
She seemed to be used to these types of situations on her undercover missions.
With a composed face, Shizuru fabricated a fitting reason.

name: Lena
text: Wha, a friend!!? Hmm, that is quite the predicament... Hang in there!!

name: Shizuru
text: Yes. Thank you.

name: Me
text: (Well that was easy...)
We had managed to fool her, but it would probably do this girl some good to be a bit more distrustful.

name: Lena
text: It happens a lot in this city. I understand how you would feel. ...And what about these three?

name: Shizuru
text: Umm, these three...?
Maybe it was because she hadn't thought that far, but Shizuru stumbled over her words a little.

name: Shizuru
text: Th-They're my friend's children... they may not look it but they're siblings.

name: Me
text: (Wait, Shizuru!? Isn't that a bit―!?)
Far-fetched...? Is what I had thought and panicked for a second, but...

name: Lena
text: Oh, you're siblings!!? I see... Sorry, I didn't even realize since you don't look alike at all!!

name: Lena
text: Still, having a parent gone missing like that... it must be tough for you all. Stay strong you three!!

name: Hebiko
text: Y-Yes!! We'll do our best. Right, onii-chan!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Right, nii-san!!!

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah...!! Let's do it!!
It couldn't be helped anymore so we played the part of siblings as best we could.

name: Me
text: (Come on now, how is she falling for this...)

name: Lena
text: Good, good. Sibling bonds are the best!!

name: Lena
text: Still... even then it'd be quite dangerous for feeble humans like yourselves to be walking around the city.

name: Lena
text: In that case, we, the knights of Nomad, could lend you a hand.

name: Shizuru
text: No, it's alright... but we appreciate your offer. We are going to meet up with someone who's going to help us right after this.

name: Lena
text: I see. If the need arises, feel free to rely on me!!

name: Lena
text: Lady Ingrid always says that lending a hand to those in need is the duty of a Devildom Knight!! ーFarewell!!
Without suspecting us for a moment, the Devildom Knight Lena bounded off in good spirits.

name: Me
text: Uuum... Are all Devildom Knights this stupid...?

name: Hebiko
text: Don't say that Fuma-chan. She was such a nice person.

name: Shizuru
text: And it's thanks to her we were saved. At least we didn't have to do anything too conspicuous.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Uwah... but guys, I was super scared....

name: Me
text: Ah, that's right, Shikanosuke!!
We had completely forgotten about him after the Devildom Knight girl's intense display.
As we consoled Shikanosuke so he wouldn't burst into tears, we followed Shizuru to the hideout.
In a certain bar in a backstreet of Yomihara...
Wary of being followed, we had taken a series of detours and arrived here.
This place was the hideout Shizuru had prepared for the undercover mission this time.
You're finally back? To think the owner would leave their customer to watch the place...
An Oni woman was sitting there in the bar.
There were no signs of other customers or staff as she drank alone.

name: Shizuru
text: Quite a thing to say after opening a bottle of bourbon without my permission.
Oh, you found that did you? Well, let's just say this one's on you.

name: Shizuru
text: *Sigh*... You're as shameless as ever I see.
Sighing exasperatedly, Shizuru turned to face us.

name: Shizuru
text: I mentioned this hideout on our way here, correct?

name: Me
text: Yes... You've infiltrated Yomihara by posing as the owner of this bar, right?
And she had also mentioned that she had left the mercenary she had hired for this mission to watch the bar.

name: Shizuru
text: Right. And she's that mercenary I spoke about―Yamata no Orochi, a warrior of the Oni tribe.

name: Shizuru
text: I've had her help me during missions in Yomihara several times before.

name: Hebiko
text: And, she's an Oni...?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Um... the same tribe as the impish Goblins and the man-eating Ogres...?
We were also quite familiar with Oni since we had fought against them several times during missions.
There are many Oni that come to the human world to earn income as mercenaries.

name: Shizuru
text: That's right. But she's not like the other small fries around here. She's a high-ranking Oni with mythical powers.

name: Me
text: Mythical...?
It sounded so exaggerated that I couldn't help but steal a glance at Yamata no Orochi―the female Oni warrior.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Heheh...
Yamata no Orochi twisted her lips into a bewitching smile as she drank alone.
She acted completely listless, and yet we could still feel an immeasurable and ominous power seeping out from her.

name: Me
text: (This woman really is on another level...)

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Hm-hm, you flatter me Shizuru...
Maybe because she had noticed my gaze, but the female warrior showed a sickly sweet smile.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: No matter how strong you are, without money you're no different from an insect. ...I'm looking forward to the payment this time as well♪

name: Shizuru
text: Naturally. In return, we'll make sure you earn your keep.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: No need to tell me twice. ...So, since your friends are here I take it it's finally time to start this operation?

name: Shizuru
text: Yes, we make for the surface tomorrow as planned. So try not to drink so much.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Hm-hm, sorry no can do there. If I don't drink all of it, this delicious liquor will weep.
Laughing smugly, the female warrior began to gulp down the rest of her drink.
Exuding an air of decadence, she made you feel restless just looking at her.

name: Shizuru
text: ...Understood. Knowing you, the booze will have left your system by morning anyway.

name: Me
text: Shizuru... Can we really trust that mercenary?
I asked Shizuru, whispering in her ear.
Yamata no Orochi did not seem to particularly care about us and was enjoying her drinks by herself at the counter.

name: Shizuru
text: Of course we can't let our guard down. She's still a resident of dangerous Yomihara after all.

name: Shizuru
text: But her combat strength is off the charts, and so far she's done what she's been paid to do... That's all I can say.

name: Me
text: Hm...
In a place like Yomihara's underground, sometimes making use of suspicious people was a necessary part of a mission.
How you handled them could show your skills as an undercover operative.

name: Shizuru
text: Alright, time is of the essence. I should explain to you about the upcoming mission.

name: Hebiko
text: Ah, been wondering about that. Heberybody only heard about going to Yomihara.

name: Shizuru
text: Right. To put it simply, the mission this time is to escort a VIP from Yomihara to the surface.

name: Me
text: A VIP...? Is there someone that important in this city...?

name: Shizuru
text: A defector from the UFS has been hiding in Yomihara to escape his pursuers.

name: Shizuru
text: He's a deserter from secret service agency "G," who you also fought against on your way here.

name: Me
text: ...That organization with the cyborg woman.
Hestia, the flame-wielding brute who was able to shoot nanomachines and control the blaze with her modified arms.
I had heard that the secret service agency "G" that Hestia belonged to was a secret agency in possession of multiple cyborg soldiers.
In other words―they were in search of the traitor from their own organization.

name: Shizuru
text: Exactly. I'd like to give you the details after I've introduced you to him―Is he upstairs?
Shizuru turned to ask Yamata no Orochi who was sipping her drink at the counter.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Ah? ...Yeah. If you mean that annoying cyborg bastard, he's been upstairs the whole time and keeping tight-lipped.

name: Shizuru
text: I see. I'll go and call for him then, so you all wait here a moment―
...That will not be necessary.
The stairs creaked and groaned as the worn-down body of a cyborg soldier came down into the bar.
I'm sorry to have dragged you into this, Taimanin. ―I am the defector.
